description: Designed to feel weightless, the All New KÜHL Resistor Lite Chino Tapered is the perfect summer pant. Experience the cool comfort of shorts with the sun protection of pants. Super stretch, unmatched rebound, and a soft, cotton, hand feel. Rugged enough to conquer the demands of the trail yet styled for more refined activities. Don't compromise. Resistance is futile.
name: Kuhl Resistor Lite Chino Tapered, 34" Inseam - Mens
